name: Reef Diving Treasure Hunt
description:
Are you in for a little treasure hunting escapade? Then dive into this beautiful ocean full of pearls!

Dive and collect the pearls to unlock your partner.
Avoid dangerous puffer fish, octopuses, and angry sharks.

Swim up, swim down and swim as far as you can.
Let’s see how long you can hold your breath!

FEATURES++
-Fun game play
-Cool graphics
-Amazing soundtrack
